mapper.select: select LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO as stationname ,case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as misdetet from AUTOFLOOR_HEALTH_MACHINE where START_DATE >= to_date('${start_date}','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND START_DATE < TO_DATE('${end_date}','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and FLOOR=#{floor_name} AND CYCLE_TYPE='DAY' group by LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO

select LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO as stationname ,case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as misdetet from AUTOFLOOR_HEALTH_MACHINE where START_DATE >= to_date('${start_date}','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND START_DATE < TO_DATE('${end_date}','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and FLOOR=#{floor_name} AND CYCLE_TYPE='WEEK' group by LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO

select LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO as stationname ,case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as misdetet from AUTOFLOOR_HEALTH_MACHINE where START_DATE >= to_date('${start_date}','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND START_DATE < TO_DATE('${end_date}','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and FLOOR=#{floor_name} AND CYCLE_TYPE='MONTH' group by LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO
